Query.Sql: select distinct d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis, ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, ae.NHSNumber, ae.CDSActivityDate from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId where ae.NHSNumber is not null

Explanation.Description: ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY DIAGNOSIS is a six character code, comprising: Diagnosis Condition n2 Sub-Analysis n1 ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL AREA n2 ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL SIDE
CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
